## Problem 2
```{r power}
a = rnorm(30, mean = 0, sd = 5)

a_sample = function(a) {
  a = rnorm(30, mean = 0, sd = 5)
  t.test(a)
}

output = vector("list", length = 5000)

for (i in 1:5000) {
  output[[i]] = a_sample()
}

#need to figure out the broom tidy thing

#if i put tidy immediately to the result for a t-test, it will work
tidy(t.test(a))

#but it doesn't work if i do tidy for the t-test in a function

#if i pull the list individually, it works
tidy(output[[1]])

a_result = bind_rows(output)

```
